0000101110000100	addi a0 a1 4
0001110111001000	add  v0 v1 a0
0010110111110000	sub  v0 v1 a0
0011110111100000	and  v1 v1 a0
0100110111111000	or   v1 v1 a0
0101110111111000	not  t0 v1 a0
0110001111100000	xor  t0 v1 a0
0111010111001111	lw   t1 0001(v1)
1000010111001111	sw   t1 0001(v1)
1001010010001000	lui  t1 1000 t1
1010011011000010	sll  t2 t2 2
1011011011000010	srl  t2 t2 2
